goal.ch: 熱帶氣象是過去二十年大氣科學領域中進展最快的一門次領域科學，本課程將以全新的角度介紹熱帶中重要天氣和氣候現象以及最新的研究進展，課程內容包含:(1)熱帶氣象綜述，(2)遙測, (3)全球環流, (4)熱帶變異, (5) 水汽與降雨分布, (6) 垂直輸送, (7)綜觀與中尺度系統, (8)熱帶氣旋, 以及(9)觀測分析與預報。
goal.en: This course covers the fundamental science of the tropical atmosphere and synthesizes the tremendous increase in our knowledge of tropical meteorology during the past two decades. It covers (i) Overview of tropical meteorology, (2) Remote sensing, (iii)Global circulation, (iv) Tropical variability, (v) Water vapor and precipitation, (vi) Vertical transport, (vii)Synoptic and mesoscale systems, (viii)Tropical cyclone, and (viiii)Observations, analysis and forecast.

outline.ch: 第一章：綜述 (Overview) 第二章：遙測 (Remote Sensing)第三章：全球環流 (Global Circulation)第四章：熱帶變異 (Tropical Variability)第五章：水汽與降雨分布 (Distribution of water vapor and precitation)第六章：垂直輸送 (Vertical transport)第七章：綜觀與中尺度系統 (Synoptic and mesoscale systems)第八章：熱帶氣旋 (Tropical cyclones)第九章：觀測分析與預報 (Observation, analysis, and forecast)
outline.en: Chapter 1: Overview What is tropical meteorology? Energy and global climate Defining the tropics Energy balance and the role of the tropics Atmospheric structure Temperature Moisture and precipitation Role of the tropics in momentum balance Tropical air masses and climatesChapter 2: Remote Sensing Introduction to remote sensing Weather radar in the tropics Satellite detection of water vapor Satellite soundings Satellite detection of clouds and precipitation Lightening detection from space Scatterometry Satellite detection of dust Monitoring the Earth’s surface from space Monitoring air chemistry from satellites Remote sensing of volcanoesChapter 3: Global Circulation General principle of atmospheric motion General circulation of the atmosphere Ocean circulation The response to equatorial heating Monsoons Tropical circulation and precipitation distribution The role of the tropics in the general circulationChapter 4 Tropical Variability Sources of intraseasonal variability Sources of interannual variability Sources of decadal variabilityChapter 5: Distribution of water vapor and precitation Atmospheric moisture Adiabatic processes and vertical distribution of moisture PrecipitationChapter 6: Vertical transport Introduction The surface-atmosphere interface The atmospheric boundary layer Vertical transport in deep convection Modeling synthesis: from the surface to the tropopauseChapter 7; Synoptic and mesoscale systems Synoptic weather systems Mesoscale weather systemsChapter 8: Tropical cyclones Global distribution and monitoring of tropical cyclones Three-dimensional structure and flow balances Tropical cyclogenesis Intensity Extratropical transition Climatology of tropical cyclones Tropical cyclone motion Societal and environmental impactsChapter 9: Observation, analysis, and forecast Challenges of tropicak weather forecasting Observations Weather analysis Numerical weather prediction in the tropics Tropical cyclone prediction Forecast verification and validation
